Lunch will not be provided at the symposium, but there will be coffee and pastries available at registration and for the breaks throughout the day.

There are many eateries within walking distance for lunch. Russo Cafe is right next to Paul Brest Hall but may get crowded at lunch. There are many other options at Tressider Marketplace including: Treehouse, CoHo, Subway, Panda Express, Starbucks, and Jamba Juice.
